data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea obovata (Sibirean spruce) from sample UKYUPCOB-192

Exposition SE, Slope 23 deg, Geology: Dünn. podsol, Lehm. Tonstein, Tree line 400 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 90%, Moss cover 15%, Vegatation type: Piceetum myrtillosum, Film number: 962A
